QuestData.Title: Scampering Scamps
QuestData.Description:
Hello again.
Could you do me and Norukk a favor? Our kids, Neelo and Nau, left to play. They know they should be back by now.
I am occupied, so please find them. I doubt they are in danger, my kids know how to take care of themselves.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ta says all gnolls are dangerous and mean. But this is just a baby!
Ma says I always have to take care of Nau, and she's a baby, too.
